descriptionHtml:
Bango\'s Nord Female save
-------------------------


Description:
-------------

At the request of several players I give here my character.
Her name is Torgen in the original, but here is named Skyrim (nothing better occurred to me and it\'s hard to hit with the taste of each name :o))


Instalation:
-------------

Use 7zip or WinRar to extract the files.
Move the Data folder to your skyrim/data folder (click \'yes to overwrite\' if necessary)
Place saves C:\\Users\\Username\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim (click \'yes to overwrite\' if necessary)


Uninstalation:
---------------

Remove the following folder:

C:\\Users\\Username\\Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\saves\\save121 - Skyrim.ess

Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\eyes\\eyesiceblue.dds

Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\fenale\\femalehead.dds
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\fenale\\femalehead_msn.dds
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\fenale\\femalehead_s.dds
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\fenale\\femalehead_sk.dds

Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\femalebrows\\femalebrow_08.dds
Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\femalebrows\\femalebrow_n.dds

Skyrim\\Data\\textures\\actors\\character\\character assets\\tintmasks (all .dds)


Used mode:
-----------

Better Females by Bella - by BellaGail (http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812)


Credits
-------

thanks Bethesda for creating Skyrim
thanks BellaGail for Better Females by Bella
author: Bango
